name: OtterUI Project File
summary: A GGP file is a project file created by OtterUI, an open-source game UI library. It is an XML file that defines an OtterUI project's name, scenes, fonts, intended platforms, and intended resolutions. GGP files are typically stored in the C:/​Program Files (x86)/​Aonyx Software/​OtterUI Editor directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: GGP file open in OtterUI Editor 1.3
